code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserForm=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[relationship,setRelationship]=useState('');const[wish,setWish]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/users',{name,relationship});setWish(response.data.wish);setName('');setRelationship('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"birthday-form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"birthday-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:" Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"relationship",children:" Relationship:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:relationship,onChange:e=>setRelationship(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",disabled:true,children:"Select Relationship"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"brother",children:"Brother"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"sister",children:"Sister"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"mother",children:"Mother"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"father",children:"Father"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"friend",children:"Friend"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Get Birthday Wish"})]}),wish&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"birthday-wish",children:wish})]});};export default UserForm;
